src_text: Curtis Cooper, ngijiye ya matematika ni mulongexi wa kwijiya kwa infolomatika mu Universidade Central ya Missouri, watonginina mbandu yadikota ya kitangu philimu kyejiya ndu mu kizuwa kya 25 ku mbeji ya katatu.

hyp_text: Curtis Cooper, a mathematics professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered a prime number over 25 million, a record-breaking find in the field of number theory.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Kimbundu]: Mu kilunga kyoso, akwa ixi yoso ya Bélgica ni Suíça azwela dizwi dya Francês endele kudilonga Francês ya kidi mu xikola, phala kutena kuditetuluka nyi mwene mutelu wa kayula ka itangu yaxindi mu ijila ya kuzela kwa dizwi dya Francês.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kimbundu]: Ku ubhitilu wa ndumba ni ndumba dya mivu, athu ene kutunga ni uhete woso ku thandu dya jisabalalu mu ibhela yakala ni itateku ni ibhidi ndu ku umwenu wa musanza wa kalunga.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kimbundu]: 800 a jimilha ja ukexilu wa jinjila ja phete Trans-Alasca ajijika kyoso jihulakaji ja itutu ya phete yokwatenene yalundumukine mu menya a lwiji ya Fairbanks, Alasca.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kimbundu]: Ididi ya lelu ya Belgika yakexile ku mbandu ya Luxemburgu no ukulu, maji phe yalunguluka ya Belgica kyoso kyabhitile Levulusa ya Belgica ya 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kimbundu]: Tunde mu izuwa akitungu, The Onion yakituka Mbonge yonene ya jihundu ja matonokenu, ni kikalakalu kimoxi kyosoneke, kididi kimoxi kixana 5.000.000 ja asonyi ene ngo mu mbeji ya Kamusasadi, jinjimbu, wanda umoxi wa jihundu 24 dya jyola, ni mukanda wa jixi ja ngongo kobange kindala awixana Ngongo yetu yatobho.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
